thread.title: Thousands gather for funeral of Fiorentina captain Astori

title: Thousands gather for funeral of Fiorentina captain Astori
text:
Thousands gather for funeral of Fiorentina captain Astori 12:17pm GMT - 00:54 
Thousands of mourners gather in Florence for the funeral of Italian soccer player Davide Astori, who died suddenly on Sunday at the age of 31. Rough cut (no reporter narration.) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Thousands of mourners gather in Florence for the funeral of Italian soccer player Davide Astori, who died suddenly on Sunday at the age of 31. Rough cut (no reporter narration.)
